bill_title: require an annual report on nonmeandered waters.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to require an annual report on nonmeandered waters. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That § 41-23-19 be AMENDED: 41-23-19. Before June 2, 2019, but after April 1, 2019On or before September first of each year, the department shall deliver a report, to the Executive Board of the Legislative Research Council which , a report that includes the following, for the preceding July first through June thirtieth: (1) An estimate of the number of acres of nonmeandered lakes open for public recreation and the number of acres of nonmeandered lakes marked pursuant to § 41-23-5; (2) For the agreements contemplated pursuant to negotiations under § 41-23-3, a statistical summary relative to regarding the number of: (a) Agreements reached with landowners; (b) Negotiations in progress; (c) Failed negotiations; and (d) Number of inquiriesInquiries from landowners to commence negotiations; (3) An analysis of the agreements pursuant to under § 41-23-3 compared to voluntary walk inwalk-in access programs for landowners; (4) A listing list of transportation lanes set pursuant to § 41-23-17; and (5) A summary of complaints, prosecutions, convictions, or and other resolution resolutions of violations on nonmeandered waters, pursuant to §§ § 41-23-6 and or 41-23-18. Following receipt and public dissemination of the report, the executive board or a designated committee of designated by the executive board shall hold one or more public hearings, which shall occur before September 3, 2019, to discuss the report and solicit input receive testimony from landowners, recreational users, and the general public other persons.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
